name: TendyTrainer
description: TendyTrainer is a VR app made for goalies to refine their skills in VR space. The goal of TendyTrainer is to provide the most realistic off-ice training environment possible. It is designed to build good habits that directly translate to the ice.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Storage: 200 MB available space
